verses.verse: <S%G4739>Stand<s%> fast <S%G3767>therefore<s%> in the <S%G1657>liberty<s%> with <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> has <S%G1659>made<s%> us <S%G1659>free,<s%> and be not <S%G1758>entangled<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> with the <S%G2218>yoke<s%> of <S%G1397>bondage.<s%>
<S%G2396>Behold,<s%> I <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, that <S%G1437>if<s%> you be <S%G4059>circumcised,<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> shall <S%G5623>profit<s%> you <S%G3762>nothing.<s%>

For I <S%G3143>testify<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> that is <S%G4059>circumcised,<s%> that he is a <S%G3781>debtor<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3551>law.<s%>

<S%G5547>Christ<s%> is <S%G2673>become<s%> of <S%G2673>no<s%> <S%G2673>effect<s%> to you, <S%G3748>whoever<s%> of you are <S%G1344>justified<s%> by the <S%G3551>law;<s%> you are <S%G1601>fallen<s%> from <S%G5485>grace.<s%>
For we through the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G553>wait<s%> for the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> by <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

For in <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> <S%G2480>avails<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> thing, <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision;<s%> but <S%G4102>faith<s%> which <S%G1754>works<s%> by <S%G26>love.<s%>
You did <S%G5143>run<s%> <S%G2573>well;<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> did <S%G348>hinder<s%> you that you should not <S%G3982>obey<s%> the <S%G225>truth?<s%>
<S%G3588>This<s%> <S%G3988>persuasion<s%> comes not of him that <S%G2564>calls<s%> you.
A <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G2219>leaven<s%> <S%G2220>leavens<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G5445>lump.<s%>

I have <S%G3982>confidence<s%> in you <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> that you will be <S%G3762>none<s%> <S%G243>otherwise<s%> <S%G5426>minded:<s%> but he that <S%G5015>troubles<s%> you shall <S%G941>bear<s%> his <S%G2917>judgment,<s%> <S%G3748>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> he be.

And I, <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> I <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G2784>preach<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> do I <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G1377>suffer<s%> <S%G1377>persecution?<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> is the <S%G4625>offense<s%> of the <S%G4716>cross<s%> <S%G2673>ceased.<s%>
I <S%G3785>would<s%> they were <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G609>cut<s%> <S%G609>off<s%> which <S%G387>trouble<s%> you.

For, <S%G80>brothers,<s%> you have been <S%G2564>called<s%> to <S%G1657>liberty;<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> use not <S%G1657>liberty<s%> for an <S%G874>occasion<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> but by <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G1398>serve<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another.<s%>

For <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> is <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> in <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4487>word,<s%> even in <S%G3588>this;<s%> You shall <S%G25>love<s%> your <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> as <S%G1438>yourself.<s%>

But <S%G1487>if<s%> you <S%G1143>bite<s%> and <S%G2719>devour<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> take <S%G991>heed<s%> that you be not <S%G355>consumed<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> of <S%G240>another.<s%>
This I <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G1161>then,<s%> <S%G4043>Walk<s%> in the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> and you shall not <S%G5055>fulfill<s%> the <S%G1939>lust<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>

For the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G1937>lusts<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> and the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh:<s%> and <S%G5023>these<s%> are <S%G480>contrary<s%> the <S%G240>one<s%> to the <S%G240>other:<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that you <S%G3361>cannot<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> the things that you <S%G2309>would.<s%>
But <S%G1487>if<s%> you be <S%G71>led<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> you are not <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G3551>law.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> are <S%G5318>manifest,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> are these; <S%G3430>Adultery,<s%> <S%G4202>fornication,<s%> <S%G167>uncleanness,<s%> <S%G766>lasciviousness,<s%>

<S%G1495>Idolatry,<s%> <S%G5331>witchcraft,<s%> <S%G2189>hatred,<s%> <S%G2054>variance,<s%> <S%G2205>jealousies,<s%> <S%G2372>wrath,<s%> <S%G2052>strife,<s%> <S%G1370>seditions,<s%> <S%G139>heresies,<s%>

<S%G5355>Contentions,<s%> <S%G5408>murders,<s%> <S%G3178>drunkenness,<s%> <S%G2970>revelings,<s%> and <S%G5125>such<s%> <S%G3664>like:<s%> of the <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G4302>tell<s%> you <S%G4302>before,<s%> as I have <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4277>told<s%> you in time <S%G4302>past,<s%> that they which <S%G4238>do<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> things shall not <S%G2816>inherit<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

But the <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> is <S%G26>love,<s%> <S%G5479>joy,<s%> <S%G1515>peace,<s%> <S%G3115>long-suffering,<s%> <S%G5544>gentleness,<s%> <S%G19>goodness,<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%>
<S%G4236>Meekness,<s%> <S%G1466>temperance:<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> there is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3551>law.<s%>
And they that are <S%G5547>Christ's<s%> have <S%G4717>crucified<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> with the <S%G3804>affections<s%> and <S%G1939>lusts.<s%>
<S%G1487>If<s%> we <S%G2198>live<s%> in the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> let us <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4748>walk<s%> in the <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>
Let us not be <S%G2755>desirous<s%> of <S%G2755>vain<s%> <S%G2755>glory,<s%> <S%G4292>provoking<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G5354>envying<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another.<s%>
